 2018-08692018-06-22LAB,  TC,  ESDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE in order to protect the health of employees in the federal jurisdiction by setting an appropriate Occupational Exposure Limits for two known health hazards: grain dust and flour dust.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0137 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
